channel.title: How can i make a donate?
channel.description:
how can i make a donate for people to donate for my server to become a dedicated?
i need the picture thing so people can press to donate,

item.title: How can i make a donate?
item.dc:creator: @legend-scape legend-scape
item.description:
@legend-scape wrote:

[quote=“hasumon, post:6, topic:243410”][quote author=legend-scape link=topic=319726.msg2532984#msg2532984 date=1226593244]

No, you just need to set-up a Paypal account, get it verified, then you can create a donate button, which will have a few links that you can put onto your website for players to donate to you.

this seems hard i just wont my server dedicated :[ 'rich have u got the website for the paypal? send me on pm please,?

[/quote]
Then pay for the dedi yourself.[/quote]

cant sorry im poor can u pay for me loool :]

Read full topic
item.source: How can i make a donate?

[/quote]
